ac: 23, touch 12, flat-footed 22 (+8 armor, +1 Dex, +1 natural, +2 shield, +1 size)
special_attacks: banner +2/+1, breath weapon (30-ft. line, 2d6 electricity damage, Reflex DC 14 half, usable every 1d4 rounds), cavalier's charge, challenge (+7, +2, 3/day)
other_gear: +1 banded mail, mwk heavy steel shield, +1 lance, mwk short sword, cloak of resistance +1
feats: Draconic Aspect (blue), Draconic Breath, Improved Initiative, Mounted Combat, Shield Wall, Weapon Focus (lance)
special_qualities: crafty, expert trainer +3, mount (cave salamander), order of the dragon (aid allies), tactician (2/day, 6 rounds, standard action)
name: Kobold Battle Master
skills: Craft (trapmaking) +3, Handle Animal +9, Perception +13, Profession (miner) +3, Ride +5, Stealth +9, Swim +5
